nodes.text: A skirmish took place aboard the Bith-operated space station Phaedacomm during the Mandalorian Wars. Under the command of rogue Jedi Master Dorjander Kace, Mandalorian forces infiltrated the station. Although Kace tried to capture it without unnecessary bloodshed, the Mandalorian warriors opened fire. A fight broke out, which resulted in the deaths of the entire station staff. The seizure of Phaedacomm cut off all communications of the planet Dantooine. The Jedi Enclave on Dantooine was later targeted by the Mandalorians.
